kDesc
It's the Modern Accessory bundle! Includes the Camera Lighter, Pen, Letter Opener, Watch, Decanter, Glass, Ice Bucket, and Candles.[#Legal]
Voici un pack d'accessoires modernes. Comprend un briquet/appareil photo, un stylo, un coupe-papier, une montre, une carafe, un verre, un seau à glaçons et des bougies.[#Legal]
Das moderne Accessoire-Set! Enthält Kamerafeuerzeug, Füllfederhalter, Brieföffner, Uhr, Karaffe, Glas, Eiskübel und Kerzenhalter.[#Legal]
Ecco il pacchetto accessori moderni! Include accendino/fotocamera, penna, tagliacarte, orologio, decanter, bicchiere, secchiello per ghiaccio e candele. [#Legal]
Conjunto de accesorios modernos. Incluye encendedor-cámara, pluma, abrecartas, reloj, decantador, copa, cubitera y velas.[#Legal]
It's the Modern Accessory bundle! Includes the Camera Lighter, Pen, Letter Opener, Watch, Decanter, Glass, Ice Bucket, and Candles.[#Legal]
현대적인 액세사리 세트입니다! 카메라 라이터, 펜, 편지 개봉기, 손목시계, 유리병, 유리잔, 얼음 바구니, 그리고 촛불을 포함합니다.[#Legal]
It's the Modern Accessory bundle! Includes the Camera Lighter, Pen, Letter Opener, Watch, Decanter, Glass, Ice Bucket, and Candles.[#Legal]
這款現代配件組合包，包括現代風相機打火機、現代風鋼筆、現代風開信刀、現代風手錶、現代風雕花玻璃酒瓶、現代風玻璃杯、現代風冰桶及現代風蠟燭。[#Legal]
